panelText.text: This story illustrates how important it is to protect personal information that you have access to of our employees, customers or business partners.
Remember – always be guided by our three key privacy principles of Limit-Guard-Delete.

1. Limit the amount of personal data you request or provide. Only request or provide the data you need for the essential and primary purpose you want to fulfill.
  2. Guard the data from unauthorized processing, loss, damage or alteration. Control the access to and dissemination of the data.
  3. Delete the data in a proper manner once you no longer need it. Prevent and stop hoarding records.
Medical conditions and other sensitive personal data, such as sexual orientation, require even more protection than other personal data.
Personal data may be shared only with people who are authorized to see it, have a business need to know the information, and intend to use it for legitimate business purposes.
